name: IPsoft
overview:
IPsoft, Incorporated operates as a managed services company. It offers solutions to enterprise customers for outsourcing information technology infrastructure operations. The company provides hosting, remote monitoring and management, help desk, communication, WAN acceleration, utility computing, virtualization, application development, consulting and systems integration, server and application support, performance management database and network support, VOIP, IP telephony, security and off-hours support, mobile solutions, storage and backup support, and SaaS services. The company also provides professional services, including application development, consulting, and systems integration. IPsoft, Incorporated serves financial, media, market research, retail, government, health care, manufacturing, technology, and telecommunications industries.

The company was founded in 1998 and is based in New York, New York with locations in New York, New York; San Jose, California; London, the United Kingdom; Bangalore, India; Amsterdam, the Netherlands; and Frankfurt, Germany.
